      • addSkipButtonListener

        public void addSkipButtonListener(int index,
                                  java.lang.String param,
                                  ScenarioParser sp)
        Description copied from class: Player
        Adds a "Skip Button" for the ScenarioParser's class to continue processing text after the ScenarioParser's userInput is set to true. Changes userInput to false to allow the ScenarioParser to continue.
        Specified by:
        addSkipButtonListener in class Player
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the button to add the listener to
        param - the String in ScenarioParser to skip to, needed for ScenarioParser's skip(String indicator) method
        sp - the reference to the current ScenarioParser object
